generic.name: Generic Assignment Rubric
generic.description: A general rubric for various assignments.

criteria.title: Content Accuracy
criteria.description: All facts, concepts, and information presented are accurate and well-supported.

criteria.title: Clarity and Organization
criteria.description: The assignment is logically organized, clear, and easy to follow. Ideas are presented coherently.

criteria.title: Critical Thinking and Analysis
criteria.description: Demonstrates strong critical thinking and insightful analysis of the subject matter.

criteria.title: Presentation and Communication
criteria.description: Solution is well-organized, legible, and clearly communicated.
